member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.IEntityDesignerExtendedProperty
member.summary: Exposes methods for adding properties to objects that are visible to a user in the Entity Data Model Designer or the Model Browser.

member.returns: An object whose public properties are displayed in the Visual StudioProperties window. For more information, see .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.IModelConversionExtension
member.summary: Exposes methods for converting a custom file format to and from the .edmx file format that is readable by the Entity Data Model Designer.

member.summary: Defines custom functionality for loading a file with a custom format and converting it to an .edmx format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.IModelConversionExtension.OnBeforeFileSaved(Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.ModelConversionExtensionContext)
member.summary: Defines custom functionality for converting an .edmx file to a file with a custom format before the file is saved.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.IModelGenerationExtension
member.summary: Exposes methods for customizing the generation of .edmx files.

member.summary: Defines custom functionality that is executed after an .edmx file has been generated by the Entity Data Model Wizard.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.IModelGenerationExtension.OnAfterModelUpdated(Microsoft.Data.Entity.Design.Extensibility.UpdateModelExtensionContext)
member.summary: Defines functionality that is executed after an .edmx file has been updated by the Update Model Wizard.

member.summary: Defines functionality for extending the process by which an .edmx file is saved by the Entity Data Model Designer.
